segments.text: I see a woman standing at the sink, absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is unwavering; she seems completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already in a puddle, but she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water streams across the cabinet doors, creating a messy scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe she can't hear the sound of rushing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen, with its tidy garden visible through the window, feels so calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the chaos inside contrasts sharply with that serenity outside.
segments.speaker: PAR
